tool_description: A web scraper to collect current auction listing information from Bring-a-Trailer
name: bring a trailer scraper
title: bring a trailer scraper

api_list.name: Get Current Auctions by Vehicle Make and Model
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all current Bring a Trailer auctions for this vehicle make and model.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bring-a-trailer-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/bmw/e46-m3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bring-a-trailer-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bring-a-trailer-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/{make}/{model}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bring-a-trailer-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
